texts.name: Boyan
texts.biography: Not a single battle took place without the participation of Boyan, the guslar, singer of heroes. The prince's squads went to battle to the majestic and menacing sounds of his songs with a firm belief in victory on the battlefield. And in battle, Boyan was a great magician; he uses his sonorous harp and casts his spells. And after the battle, with his songs he praised the victorious prince and the warriors who fell in battle.
